Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Kafkan Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Kafkan Way and Riverdell Way.
Room.LongDescription: The large Iilandi University lies to the east of the intersection on both corners. On the southeast corner is the University Library and on the northeast corner is the Odinialli Memorial Administration Building. Much of the University is privately donated and funded as the city does not take a great interest in the school, except when it is up for various honors, which it receives quite often.
